concept.title: Creating Your Own Content And Using Media Assets
concept.shortdesc: The previous sections showed you just a sample of the power of ePublisher.

conbody.p: We wanted to give you an area where you could use your content and possibly some of your media assets. This area is in the second “Group” of this trial. For more of an explanation of “Groups” check out our “Next Steps” section.

If you have seen enough, and you would like to get some answers to specific questions, you can contact us at 877-6-WEBWORKS or (877) 693-2967. Our sales department can answer any questions or move you on to customizing an ePublisher project with your documentation.
